title: Was a 7-Year-Old Boy Killed for Not Memorizing Bible Verses?
subtitle: Reports on a grisly April 2018 death in Wisconsin noted that the victim was being "punished" by his guardian.
author: Arturo Garcia
vclaim: At the time of his death in April 2018, 7-year-old Ethan Hauschultz was being punished for not memorizing thirteen Bible verses.
